full_text: Monet painted the Rouen Cathedral repeatedly, working on as many as 14 different versions at once. Looking at them together you can track the change in the light and the angle of his perspective https://t.co/vFXhkpD4eQ

localize.full_text: 莫奈反复画鲁昂大教堂，一次创作了多达14个不同的版本。把它们放在一起看，你可以追踪光线的变化和他的视角https://t.co/vFXhkpD4eQ。
莫奈反覆畫魯昂大教堂，一次創作了多達14個不同的版本。把它們放在一起看，你可以追蹤光線的變化和他的視角https://t.co/vFXhkpD4eQ。
